attributes.action: Insist with legislation that NHS Psychiatrists end their lazy bad habit of diagnosing everything as schitsophrenia to the detriment of thousands of patients.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: NHS Psychiatrists have enjoyed for decades the freedom to give a diagnosis of schitsophrenia to many forms of mental illness which are not, as their quick and easy method of processing patients. It's about time Psychiatrists earned their salaries.

reasons: Potentially libellous, false, or defamatory statements
